name: Hacktool Service Registration or Execution
description: Detects PsExec service installation and execution events (service and Sysmon)
query: (winlog.channel:System AND (winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:(7045 OR 7036)) AND (winlog.event_data.ServiceName:(/.*[Ww][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Cc][Ee]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Xx][Ee][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Ww][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ss][Ee][Cc][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp].*/) OR winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND (winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:(7045 OR 7036)) AND (winlog.event_data.ServiceName:(*WCESERVICE* OR *WCE\ SERVICE* OR *winexesvc* OR *DumpSvc* OR *pwdump* OR *gsecdump* OR *cachedump*) OR winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*bypass*))`
